## absoluteCoordinates variable

Retrieve the absolute coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
absoluteCoordinates: ({ view, element, position, cursorHeight, }: AbsoluteCoordinatesParams) => {
    left: number;
    right: number;
    top: number;
    bottom: number;
}
```

## Remarks

We need to translate the co-ordinates because `coordsAtPos` returns co-ordinates relative to `window`<!-- -->. And, also need to adjust the cursor container height. (0, 0)

```
+--------------------- [window] ---------------------+
|   (left, top) +-------- [Offset Parent] --------+  |
| {coordsAtPos} | [Cursor]   <- cursorHeight      |  |
|               | [FloatingToolbar]               |  |

```
